[[File:Capture hypoCa.jpg|vignette|ECG in hypocalcaemic situation]]

*Cardiac electrical disturbances in hypocalcaemia:
**QT interval prolongation
**May be complicated by atrioventricular block
Can be complicated by atrioventricular block **Ventricular fibrillation


'''Figure''' QT space widening (500 mS/heart rate at 64/min)

question.title: What is a potential complication of QT interval prolongation in hypocalcaemia?
question.description: A cardiac electrical disturbance associated with hypocalcaemia

option_c.title: Atrioventricular block
option_c.description: A condition where the electrical signal between the heart's chambers is blocked

option_d.title: Supraventricular tachycardia
option_d.description: A type of abnormal heart rhythm originating above the ventricles
